Emilia Aureli, Aurelio, d. 1708. Costanza di Rosamonda.
[8], 95 p.
Printed for the author, London : 1672.
A tragedy. "Plot ... from La Costanza di Rosamondo [i.e. Rosmonda], of Aurelio Aureli"--Author's note entitled "To the onely few." Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
